forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 66F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy late. Potential for flooding rains. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy late. Potential for flooding rains. Low near 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 54F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain ending overnight. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the evening. Low 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 13C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 57F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 13C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 56F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.
